Room.RoomText: You hear a loud yell, when you look back you find your friend laying on the floor harmed. When you further inspect him you see that his leg is broken. (Inspect Surrounding)
Room.RoomDescription: You: "Looks bad, I need to find help, maybe in the Fire Watch Tower nearby." Him: "Here have my watch and don't forget to take the map." (Grab Item)

Room.RoomText: The river flows calm, the miners probably washed their gold here in the old days, looking at the river bed.
Room.RoomDescription: Some old rusted items lay out scattered on the floor nearby the river, maybe something usefull lays between it.

Room.RoomText: On your East there is the path you've just cut. It looks like no one has been in the hut for a while, everthing is covered with dust.
Room.RoomDescription: Still some stuff scattered around the hut, should be something usefull here, hopefully.

Room.RoomText: On your North there is a path, on your West everything is overgrown with vines. It seems some small animals have been crossing this path.
Room.RoomDescription: The ground is covered with rock and tree roots, I better watch my step.

Room.RoomText: On the north is the way back to the mine, on your south you hear water flowing.
Room.RoomDescription: Nothing but a waving dirt path and some bushes around you.

Room.RoomText: At your North you see a rockwall, seems dangerous. A crisscross of animal footprints are to been seen on the ground, I even think I see footprint a bear.
Room.RoomDescription: Going up the rockwall doesn't look safe without some gear.

Room.RoomText: Looking at the cut treestumps and the barren path, the miners probably had a road here a long time ago. Only one big old tree remains on the side of the path.
Room.RoomDescription: Something is hanging from a low branch on the tree.

Room.RoomText: An old Mine, it's hammered shut and has an warning sign on it. The path up ahead looks risky, Mine Camp to your right and behind you a dirt pad with a sign "Bright River".
Room.RoomDescription: Through the gaps in the wood, you see something on the floor reflecting the light from outside, but I can't reach it.

Room.RoomText: What once probably was a busy camp, now only abandoned run down cabin and huts remain.
Room.RoomDescription: Most of the cabins and huts are to dangerous to enter, all are close to collapsing.

Room.RoomText: Finally, I've reached the watchtower. Now I need to find something to communicate with.
Room.RoomDescription: A lockbox sits in the corner of the room, I need to open it.

Room.RoomText: I've reached the top of the cliff, the watchtower is to my west, it seems to be locked. Better have a good look first.
Room.RoomDescription: You try to open the door and something falls on the floor. The door is locked and the lock is broken. Maybe through the window?

Room.RoomText: I better watch my step, loose rocks all up the path.
Room.RoomDescription: When you take another step, rocks start to fall, I better be carefull.

Room.RoomText: A big rockcliff behind me and a big drop in front of me. Left of me dense shrubs and old cutdown treestump.
Room.RoomDescription: When you sit down on the stump and look around you, to clear your mind. You see something stuck in the stump.

Room.RoomText: It's really dark, I can't see what is inside. It looks like something has been living here.
Room.RoomDescription: I don't even dare to go in without knowing what is in there, it's really too dark.

Room.RoomText: Scary how large this forest is, no town or houses in sight, just tree tops reaching far behind the horizon. This place has been visited recently.
Room.RoomDescription: Looks like more than one person has been here. Old fire pit, empty cans and...

Room.RoomText: This looks to be build a long time ago for campers and hikers. Too relax and sit out of the wind and ejoy the view.
Room.RoomDescription: The construction still seems strong, but I see nothing usefull laying around.
